name: Eat. Your. Vegetables!
description:
Play as Smith and John, two regular cranky old british men who've been living next to each other for now 39 years. And this sunday, much like any other Sunday, they've been fighting about who's music was the best. And this Sunday, much like any other Sunday, they're ready to throw in both their explosive veggies and their sick dance moves in the argument.

Just a regular Sunday.

Controls : 

Credits :

Charlie Vincent - Game Design

Paul Coret - Composer / Sound Designer

Léo Deschaux Beaume - Programmer
Pierre Hennecart  - Programmer
Oscar Juteau - Producer

This game was developped in more or less 30 hours during the Global Game Jam 2023 at the CNAM ENJMIN by a team composed of Master and Bachelor students. We then polished it a bit before posting.
